title: Box Breathing (4-4-4-4)
content: Inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s. Repeat 4 cycles to reduce stress.

title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
content: Name 5 things you see, 4 you feel, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste.

title: Reframing Negative Thoughts (CBT)
content: Identify the negative thought, gather evidence for/against, and reframe it more realistically.
